Finding target
Install Path is 'C:\Program Files\Activision\Blur(TM)'

Closing game
ApplyPatch Blur.exe BlurExe.bsdiff
(CRC 0x79eacaf8 => 0xa478144e)
Old Path: 'C:\Program Files\Activision\Blur(TM)\Blur.exe'
Current CRC: 0x9e98b8d8
'C:\Program Files\Activision\Blur(TM)\Blur.exe' has a CRC of 0x9e98b8d8, was expecting 0x79eacaf8

Every single time trying to apply the patch this message Pops Up? How do I solve it?
This actually works.For some idiots,when you patch the game you have to have an original exe.

Thanks it works without problems, if you follow instruction.
I don't know what changes include in this update, however I realize the ultra fps drops during loading has been fixed, at least for me.

If you get CRC error it means that patch can't find path to the game.
Add or alternate this registry keys:
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE-SOFTWARE-Activision-Blur
"InstallPath"="app"
"EXEString"="appBlur.exe"
BACON BOGEY PAPER BUTTON FART WHISTLE

1.install game.
2.run update bizupdater pack.
3.rename blur.exe (20,803kb) to blur original.exe.
4.copy blur (28,221kb) to Programme Files Activision/blur folder.
5.play game:)
